Package org.freedomdave.utils.text

Class TextTableColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.freedomdave.utils.text.TextTableColumn
  • public class TextTableColumn
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates a column within a text table. A column has a name (header label), an alignment (LEFT, RIGHT, CENTER), width (either fixed or AUTO_WIDTH), and associated data values.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int AUTO_WIDTH
      Constant that specifies that width should be auto-calculated.
      static java.lang.String EMPTY_VALUE
      Constant that can be used to specify an empty value.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name (header label) of the column.

      • setName

        public void setName​(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name (header label) of the column.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the data values of the column. Does not affect the name/header label of the column.

      • getValues

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getValues()
        Returns the current data values for the column.

      • setValues

        public void setValues​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> values)
        Sets the data values for the column. Replaces any existing values.

      • addValues

        public void addValues​(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> values)
        Adds a series of values to the existing column data.

      • addValue

        public void addValue​(java.lang.String value)
        Adds a single value to the existing column data.

      • getNumRows

        public int getNumRows()
        Returns the number of rows (data values) in the column. This may differ from the number of rows reported by a table that contains this column.

      • getRowValue

        public java.lang.String getRowValue​(int row)
        Returns the value for a particular (zero based) row index.

      • getAlignment

        public TextFormatter.Alignment getAlignment()
        Returns the current alignment set for the column.
        See Also:
        TextFormatter.Alignment

      • setAlignment

        public void setAlignment​(TextFormatter.Alignment alignment)
        Sets the current alignment set for the column.
        See Also:
        TextFormatter.Alignment

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Returns the text width of this column. This value does NOT include padding. If width is set to AUTO_WIDTH, this method returns the calculated width of the column based on the current data values.

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth​(int width)
        Sets the width of the column. Default is AUTO_WIDTH but can be set to another fixed value. Values that are longer than a fixed width will be truncated with ellipses (...) when generated as part of a table.
